title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.6 - Receipts need approval of authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.6 - Receipts need approval of authority

State Regulations

No licensee holding a license pursuant to section
61
or
62
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, shall sell, offer for sale, agree to sell or deliver to a retail licensee
holding a license pursuant to section
63
or
64
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, in
this State, any liquor described and identified by warehouse receipts, unless
and until a specimen of such receipt shall have been submitted to the State

Liquor Authority with a written request for approval and written approval by
the authority obtained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
64.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
